BLHar2339.Transcription:
Almyȝti god so merciableIn fedinge þou make us
                    resonableffor to serue þee hereAnd þerto lord þou make
                    us ableTo be fed at þin heuenli tableWiþ alle þi
                    seintis in fere
BLHar2339.Attributed Title:
Þese ben gracis to fore mete (rubricated, f.
                    121v)

TCD70.Transcription:
Almiȝti god so merciableIn feding þu make us
                    resonableffor to serue þee hereAnd þer to lord þou make
                    us ableTo be fed at þin heuenli tableWiþ alle þi
                    seintis in fere
TCD70.Note:
Immediately followed by words ‘Pater noster’
                    indicating beginning of prayer.
